div.p: ‚ÄúIt all starts with you ‚Äì the student ‚Äì at Clintondale. Our number one priority is providing you with all the tools you‚Äôll need to create your own launchpad for success, whether that means college, technical training, apprenticeships or jobs right after graduation. Come learn what Dragon Pride is all about.‚Äù

div.h3: Clintondale's world-class, 21st-century education opportunities have been featured in

div.p:
Ô¬Ñ?It√¢¬Ä¬ôs hard to believe that I graduated from Clintondale High School in 2006! Since graduation, I√¢¬Ä¬ôve earned an undergraduate degree from the University of Michigan, a law degree from Penn State Law and have been practicing law in Philadelphia for five years√¢¬Ä¬îall of which was made possible by the dedicated educators at CHS who encouraged me to dream big, pushed me to excel academically and who held me accountable. I am especially thankful for the unique community-based/familial learning environment I experience at CHS, where the staff√¢¬Ä¬ôs commitment to your personal and academic development reached far beyond the classroom.
√Ø¬Ñ¬é

√Ø¬Ñ?I wouldn't be the person, man, father, or husband I am today without the guidance of Mrs. Cargill; she is family, and one of the most thoughtful, caring, and considerate people I know. I am blessed to have her in my life to this day. My experiences in Student Congress were some of the most memorable things about High School. I thoroughly enjoyed my time at Clintondale.√Ø¬Ñ¬é

img.alt: Jason Allen, Stars Director- TX Market for Cigna HealthSpring

p.span: Jason Allen, Stars Director- TX Market for Cigna HealthSpring

div.p: √Ø¬Ñ?I feel that Clintondale has helped me in many ways to get where I am today and I√¢¬Ä¬ôve met a lot of great and supportive staff and people along the way. Clintondale has allowed me to have access to see what√¢¬Ä¬ôs in the medical field and I was given the opportunity to attend CPC and learned so much. Now I am working at the hospital as an ER Tech and plan to finish college to become a Labor and Delivery Nurse.√Ø¬Ñ¬é
